name: asl_file
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: ASL data manipulation tool for FSL

inputs.description: ASL data file
inputs.name: Data file

inputs.description: Number of TIs in the file
inputs.name: Number of TIs

inputs.description: Mask file
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Input block format
inputs.name: Input block format

inputs.description: ASL data form
inputs.name: Input ASL form

inputs.description: Number of repeats at each TI as comma separated list, not required if the number of repeats is same for all TIs  (only for use with --ibf=tis)
inputs.name: Repeats

inputs.description: Data contains adjacent pairs of measurements (e.g. Tag, Control) DEPRECATED use --iaf instead
inputs.name: Pairs

inputs.description: Split the pairs within the data, e.g. to separate tag and control images in output
inputs.name: Split pairs

inputs.description: Take the difference between the pairs, i.e., Tag-control difference
inputs.name: Difference

inputs.description: Do surround subtraction on the pairs
inputs.name: Surround subtraction

inputs.description: Option to extrapolate the edge of the brain to fix the artefact on the edge of the brain
inputs.name: Extrapolate

inputs.description: Neighbour size for extrapolation, must be an odd number between 3 and 9. Default: 5
inputs.name: Neighbour size

inputs.description: GM partial volume map
inputs.name: GM partial volume map

inputs.description: WM partial volume map
inputs.name: WM partial volume map

inputs.description: Kernel size (in voxels) of partial volume correction, must be an odd number between 3 and 9. Default: 5
inputs.name: Kernel size

inputs.description: Output data file
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Output block format
inputs.name: Output block format

inputs.description: Output ASL data having taken mean at each TI to file
inputs.name: Mean output

inputs.description: Split data into separate files for each TI, specify filename root
inputs.name: Split output

inputs.description: Output epochs of ASL data (takes mean at each TI within the epoch)
inputs.name: Epoch output

inputs.description: Length of epochs in number of repeats
inputs.name: Epoch length

inputs.description: Amount of overlap between epochs in number of repeats
inputs.name: Epoch overlap

inputs.description: Epochs to be determined over
inputs.name: Epoch unit

inputs.description: Deconvolution of data with arterial input functions
inputs.name: Deconvolution

inputs.description: Arterial input functions for deconvolution (4D volume, one aif for each voxel within mask)
inputs.name: Arterial input functions

inputs.description: Display the help message
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: Display version identification
inputs.name: Version
